"PA Customization":
"About PA Customization

With this, you can create a \"Custom Disk\" that customizes the power and behavior of a PA for the character that uses it.

The \"Custom Disk\" you create can be applied to the PA by using it from your Inventory, as long as you have learned that PA. You can remove all customization from the PA by using a reset item.
